data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jablonski, Daniel, Regan, John M., Holzheuser, Chace, Farooqi, Javeed, Basit, Abdul, Masroor, Rafaqat (2019): Additional data to the herpetofauna of Afghanistan. Herpetozoa 32: 177-193, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/herpetozoa.32.e38171, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/herpetozoa.32.e38171
